nodes.text: Kabak was a male cadet in Lothal's Academy for Young Imperials. He was assigned to squad LRC077, and was a member of Unit Aurek. He was a replacement for "Dev Morgan", a rebellious cadet who was secretly the undercover rebel Ezra Bridger. Kabak tended to be somewhat less calm than Rykoff, another cadet who joined the Imperial Academy around the same time.
Author Jason Fry named this character, along with Rykoff, after a baseball writer of his acquaintance. As both of the writers in question are Yankee fans, he made their characters "bad guys".
